description: Bluebeard (Caryopteris incana 'DCARBEYBAR' BEYOND PINK'D) is a remarkably beautiful plant species. It's bright, striking pink-purple foliage and its amazing arching clusters of bright blue flowers make it a standout in any garden. Its long-lasting blooms appear in late summer and make it a great choice for extending your floral display. Additionally, bluebeard has been proven to be a highly drought tolerant plant, requiring minimal water and effort to create a beautiful landscape. With its strong constitution and eye-catching color, this species is sure to be a delightful addition to any garden.
